summary: Adds an outlaw themed outfit to the game.
descriptionHtml:
Description
===========
Adds an outlaw themed outfit to the game.

Location
========
In the cloth, light armor, and heavy armor versions; the armor is craftable only.
The cloth version requires no smithing skill and is of course at 0 armor.
The light armor version requires glass smithing and is comparable to glass armor.
The heavy armor version requires ebony smithing and is comparable to ebony armor.

Details
=======
Was running around in Rand0mNumbers\' western hat and hothtrooper44\'s vagabond armor, and thought this is a great basis for an outlaw/desperado/hired gun styled character. There are three versions of this mod, an unarmored version, light armor, & heavy armor.

If you want to use the console to get the armor, just type \"help desperado 0\" into the console without the \"\".

Argonians Read This
==================
If you want to rock awesome raptor styled talons on your feet, either download artifex\'s original mod which uses the default Skyrim textures:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19283

Or use my version which makes it use JazzJR\'s awesome Argonian retexture:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19305

Or use T3alrose\'s version which makes it use Drachis\' awesome Argonian retexture:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20130

And be sure to use the Argonian folder in this Desperado Attire mod.

Credits
=======
Thanks to Rand0mNumbers for his western hat mesh and textures.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19263 (His hat isn\'t on the nexus yet, so here is his awesome Dragon Age weapons instead)
Thanks to hothtrooper44 for his Vagabond Armor from which the male armor is based on.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13230
Thanks to Yuril for his Thieves Guild Armor Denim Style textures from which created the basis of my textures.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6628
Thanks to artifex0 for his Argonian Raptor Feet mod from which the boots mesh came from. 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19283

Misc
=======
A stripped down version of this mod is available on the Steam Workshop:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=80766634

Update 07/09
=======
Added an alternative texture for the Septim coin on the hat. This texture uses the Imperial Dragon flip side of the coin versus the Tiber Septim side the default mod uses. Just copy over the old textures.
author: decrepithawk
